Title: Includes masking products within the definition of drug-related paraphernalia
Summary: Includes masking products including but not limited to synthetic urine, human urine, a substance used or designed to be added to human urine or a substance used or designed to be added to a chemical test, within the definition of drug-related paraphernalia.
LawCode: Amd ยง850, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to including masking products within the definition of drug-related paraphernalia
